title: How to Test if a Dish Is Microwavable

steps.headline: Place the glass of water and the dish into the microwave oven.
Cook on high for 30 seconds to one minute.
Remove from the oven.
steps.description:
Test the water in the glass:
Cool water and a warm or hot dish suggests that you should not use the dish in the microwave
Warm water and cool dish suggests that the dish will be fine in the microwave

text:
Fill a glass of water.  Place the glass of water and the dish into the microwave oven.  Cook on high for 30 seconds to one minute.  Remove from the oven. Test the water in the glass:
Cool water and a warm or hot dish suggests that you should not use the dish in the microwave
Warm water and cool dish suggests that the dish will be fine in the microwave
